trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Myapps portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Myapps portal

trans-unit.source: This page will show users where in the Myapps portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.
trans-unit.target: This page will show users where in the Myapps portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.

trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Myapps portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Myapps portal

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Office 365 you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Office 365 portal.

trans-unit.source: To access additional security verification settings in the Myapps portal
trans-unit.target: To access additional security verification settings in the Myapps portal

trans-unit.source: Click on your user name and select Additional Security Verification.
trans-unit.target: Click on your user name and select Additional Security Verification.

trans-unit.source: You should now be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.
trans-unit.target: You should now be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.
